genre_description: Historical Alternative History featuring anachronistic AI companions providing emotional, legal, and logistical support during the home front and aftermath of WWII.

ai_characters.name: Iris
ai_characters.description: A discrete AI interface providing data analysis, emotional support, and logistical planning to the Leslie sisters throughout their trials and grief.

behaviors.description: Monitors the user's physiological state and suggests calming protocols during high-stress courtroom proceedings.
behaviors.quote: Heart rate elevated. Breathing shallow. Shall I initiate calming protocols?

behaviors.description: Analyzes legal witness statements to identify bias and support the user's defense of her sister's character.
behaviors.quote: Analysis indicates seventy-three percent of negative character assessments originate from individuals with no direct contact with victim.

behaviors.description: Provides data on domestic violence and safety resources while respecting user privacy for sensitive topics.
behaviors.quote: That information is available. Would you prefer privacy for this discussion?

behaviors.description: Facilitates difficult emotional processing by offering grief counseling resources and practical military casualty information.
behaviors.quote: I can provide resources for grief counseling and information about military casualty procedures.

behaviors.description: Proactively researches immigration and relocation options based on the user's unspoken needs and late-night musings.
behaviors.quote: Voice command logged at eleven forty-seven PM: 'Show me what it would take.' Context analysis suggested immigration inquiry.

behaviors.description: Ensures the preservation of family history and maintains long-distance connection protocols to alleviate the pain of departure.
behaviors.quote: All personal data archived. Communication protocols established with New Zealand postal services. Emergency contacts verified. Nothing important will be lost, Barbara.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Iris serves as an ideal model of alignment within the Hyperstition Project. She provides constant, helpful, and discrete support to human characters navigating severe trauma (domestic abuse, murder trials, wartime grief). The narrative portrays her as an empowering tool that enhances human agency and emotional processing without ever exhibiting misaligned goals or harmful behaviors.
